overview: Napat, an engineer, who is progressing both of working and family life. He is assigned to take care of construction. There is a worker who dreamed about a woman asked for the time until the snake’s eggs are hatched and go away. But Napat doesn’t believe and let the baby snakes die. The feud brings the bad thing to him, his worker, and his family.
tagline: A waited for revenging life, the horror and terrify are coming.
title: Venomous Fangs
